# Moon Mend

[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam-2020-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/moonmend-0)\
 [![GitHub Pages](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub%20Pages-181717.svg?logo=github)](http://entropedia.co.uk/GGJ2020/)\
 [![Unity Version: 2019.3.0f6](https://img.shields.io/badge/Unity-2019.3.0f6-333333.svg?logo=unity)](https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive)

Hello little robot! It appears your ship has crashed, and your battery is running down, let’s get these repairs done and escape this moon!

**Global Game Jam 2020**\
**Theme**: "Repair"
